data.name: اِی آی گرو
data.description: AiGrow is a growth engine designed to get your social media marketing to the next level. Formerly known as TagScout, It has been used by more than 10,000 social media experts and influencers. AiGrow is an international company growing fast with employees in Canada, India, and Iran. Our team in Iran was formed less than 6 months ago and the office is currently located at Tehran University.
